title: Anyone has Threat Tracker for sale?

comments.content: Looking to buy 1 or 2 Threat Tracker and some extra damage and resource tokens.  Pls reply or pm me.
I'd let 2 go for $39.99!  Seriously' if you can't get one, get a couple 10 sided dice at your local gaming store.
you can get them at www.toywiz.com for a couple bucks, they also sell single cards from the core set.
